casebody.data:
No. 973, No. 974,

Misc.

Misc.

Smith v. United States; and Bowden v. United States. Petitioner pro se in No. 973, Mise. Bernard Margolius for petitioner in No. 974, Mise. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Beatrice Rosenberg and Sidney M. Glazer for the United States.

United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 117 U. S. App. D. C. 1, 324 F. 2d 879.
